content: **crocheted trivet and pot holder in 2 strands drops paris piece is worked in a spiral with 2 colours theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsholidayswirls drops design pattern w-958 yarn group c + c or e ---------------------------------------------------------- **size trivet** piece measures approx 24 cm in diameter **size pot holder** piece measures approx 14 cm in diameter **yarn for trivet** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 17 off white 50 g colour 37 bordeaux 1 trivet weighs approx 65 g **yarn for pot holders** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 17 off white 50 g colour 37 bordeaux 1 pot holder weighs approx 23 g **yarn for the entire set** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 17 off white 50 g colour 37 bordeaux **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 6 mm **crochet gauge** 12 treble crochets in width and 6 row vertically with 2 strands on hook size 6 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized hook or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized hook -------------------------------------------------------
